title: WTB: SGC/PSA HOFs + Dahlen, Shag, Powers
author: awcornelius

posts.post_title: WTB: SGC/PSA HOFs + Dahlen, Shag, Powers
posts.post_content:
Looking for nice, centered, crease free 2-4 range SGC/PSA graded cards (or 1’s with back damage but nice fronts).

My current wants:

Bill Bernhard (Southern League)
Chase (Holding Trophy)
E. Collins
Lajoie (Throwing & w/ bat)
Marquard (Portrait)
M. Powers
Ike Rockenfeld (Southern League)
Shaughnessy
Tinker (Portrait)
B. Wallace
Wheat

Let me know and thanks in advance!

-Wade

Wade access to my Flickr page is in my signature. I have a Dahlen album. Happy to try and help you out if any of the Piedmont or Sweet Caps interest you. Shoot me a pm if you see anything. 

Thanks.
Todd, just sent you a pm
